name: Maple Almond Energy Bites
author: Quaker®
summary: Oats, almond butter, maple syrup, and almonds make quick and delicious energy bites for days when you're on the go.
ingredients: 2 ¼ cups Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
3 tablespoons almond flour or oat flour
1 tablespoon sliced almonds, chopped, toasted if desired
directions: Place oats and almond flour in large bowl; stir to blend well
Add combined almond butter and syrup
Stir until ingredients are well blended
Add apple juice and stir to combine ingredients, adding water as needed for shaping consistency
If desired, add salt to taste preference
Spread chopped almonds on waxed paper in single layer
Gently press top of each ball into almonds
